name: Unteleported
tagline: Elite ruby on rails, mobile and IOT developers
description:
Unteleported helps startups with web and mobile apps. We are experts in ruby, rails and swift. We excel in IOT plays, including device prototyping, BLE and LoRa connectivity.  We love to explore new technologies that create new opportunities. We are proud of our projects. 
We have a solid track record.We have multiple clients based in USA, UK and Denmark, including VC and seed funded startups. We serve clients from the following industries: 
Finance
e-commerce 
entertainment 
public services 
restaurant services
vending machines
